name: UActorGroupingUtils
doc: Helper class for grouping actors in the level editor

methods.name: AddSelectedToGroup
methods.doc: Activates "Add to Group" mode which allows the user to select a group to append current selection

methods.name: CanGroupActors
methods.doc: Check if the provided list of actors can be grouped together

methods.name: CanGroupSelectedActors
methods.doc: * Check if the currently selected actors can be grouped together

methods.name: GroupActors
methods.doc: Creates a new group from the provided list of actors removing the actors from any existing groups they are already in

methods.name: GroupSelected
methods.doc: Creates a new group from the current selection removing the actors from any existing groups they are already in

methods.name: LockSelectedGroups
methods.doc: Locks any groups in the current selection

methods.name: RemoveSelectedFromGroup
methods.doc:
Removes any groups or actors in the current selection from their immediate parent.
If all actors/subgroups are removed, the parent group will be destroyed.

methods.name: UngroupActors
methods.doc: Disbands any groups that the provided actors belong to, does not attempt to maintain any hierarchy

methods.name: UngroupSelected
methods.doc: Disbands any groups in the current selection, does not attempt to maintain any hierarchy

methods.name: UnlockSelectedGroups
methods.doc: Unlocks any groups in the current selection
